QuestData.Title: Barrels of Fun
QuestData.Description: I love blowing stuff up. It's in my blood!$B$BThe yaungol to the west at Fire Camp Ordo have a ton of explosive barrels just lying around.$B$BI say we put them to good use and destroy their oil-pumpin' machines while having some fun!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Explosive Barrels found in Fire Camp Ordo to destroy the East, South, and West Oil Rigs.
